Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_OPTION_VALUES_UPD_SP" ( P_OPTION_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_COMPONENT_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_USER_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_VALUE IN VARCHAR2, P_LAST_UPDATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1 ) IS V_USER_ID NUMBER := NULL; V_COMPONENT_ID NUMBER := NULL; V_ID NUMBER; BEGIN IF P_COMPONENT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SELECT MAX (ID) INTO V_COMPONENT_ID FROM CMN_COMPONENTS WHERE COMPONENT_CODE = P_COMPONENT_CODE; END IF; IF P_USER_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN SELECT MAX (ID) INTO V_USER_ID FROM CMN_SEC_USERS WHERE USER_NAME = P_USER_NAME; END IF; SELECT NVL (MAX (ID), -9) INTO V_ID FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID = (SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = P_OPTION_CODE) AND NVL (COMPONENT_ID, -9) = NVL (V_COMPONENT_ID, -9) AND NVL (USER_ID, -9) = NVL (V_USER_ID, -9); IF (V_ID != -9) THEN UPDATE CMN_OPTION_VALUES SET VALUE = P_VALUE, LAST_UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY = P_LAST_UPDATED_BY WHERE ID = V_ID; END IF; END;
